archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SUP.8.BP9 Manage the storage of configuration items and baselines
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Ensure the integrity and availability of configuration items and baselines through appropriate scheduling and resourcing of storage, archiving (long term storage) and backup of the used CM systems. NOTE 7: Backup, storage and archiving may need to extend beyond the guaranteed lifetime of available storage media. Relevant configuration items affected may include those referenced in note 2 and note 3. Availability may be specified by contract requirements.
